events.title: Grill 'N Chill 2022
events.description: Grill 'N Chill is Aggies For Limbs' annual food event for this semester. A food event is held every April near Texas A&M University's campus and is open to all families. This event is a fun cookout to raise money for Ashton's Angels. 100% of proceeds will be given to Ashton's Angels.
features: Lots of American grill themed food

schedule.notes: Check in will be at the pavilion. There will be free parking at the venue.

tickets.note: Ordering by 4/10 guarantees you an event t-shirt. Tickets will not be sold day of event.

gallery.alt: Group photo of Aggies for Limbs members at Brian Bachmann Community Park
Event registration setup with Aggies for Limbs banners and check-in tables at a covered pavilion with a Texas star emblem

events.title: Turkey Run 2022
events.description: Turkey Run is Aggies For Limbs' annual 5k event for this semester. A 5k event is held every November or December near Texas A&M University's campus and is open to all families. This event is a fun fall themed 5k run or walk to raise money for Ashton's Angels. 100% of proceeds will be given to Ashton's Angels.
features: Dress up in your favorite Fall/Thanksgiving gear
Treats to fill your belly after you run

schedule.notes: Please allow some time to check in, lines can be long. Check in will be at the pavilion. There will be free parking at the venue.

earlyBird.note: Ordering by 11/3 guarantees you an event t-shirt

general.note: Ordering after 11/3 will be first come first serve for extra shirts
